nodes.text: The Wodan system was located in the Rifle Worlds, an area of the Hapes Cluster in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim. It was connected by the hyperlane known as the Great Rim Route to the Divora and Relephon systems and by another hyperspace route linked it to the Algnadesh system. The Wodan system was home to the creatures known as Wodanian wood-sprites.
The Wodan system was introduced in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-9.
